Package harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib

Class TProgressiveSetFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib.TAbstractSetFactory
      • harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib.TProgressiveSetFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISetFactory, java.lang.Runnable
    public class TProgressiveSetFactory
extends TAbstractSetFactory
    This class implements an heuristic algorithm that generate list of series aiming to reduce (i.e. equalize) equal numbers between each couple of cards and equal numbers between couple of single rows of the cards. Technically, generated series are added to the list only if they do not have more equal numbers by card or by row of chosen thresholds if compared to all the cards already inserted in the list.
    Since:
    1.8
    See Also:
    ISetFactory, TSeriesList, TMakeSix

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getMethodName()
      Return a symbolic name identifying the used heuristic algorithm.
      void run()
      This method implements the generate-control-regenerate loop needed to create the desired number of card series without exceeding limits set for max equal numbers between cards and single rows.
